post:
Hi Folks,

Few KVM offers from Phoenix USA, and possibly the final stock released for LES this year.

Phoenix, Arizona, USA KVM offers:

---------------

**LowEndSpirit**

I have made a few changes to LES recently, now everything is in its final form I am ready to release stock again.

The intent is that stock will only be reviewed once p/year from now on, the next review will be January 2018, if you want to get your hands on one now is the time, individual exceptions will not be made later.

Available locations and stock:
<pre>
Netherlands - 112
United Kingdom - 25
Italy - 60
Phoenix - 50
Japan - 100
</pre>
<a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=13">Order link</a>

Price €3.50 p/Year

Specs:

<img src="http://i.imgur.com/ZktYtQq.png" />

All LES locations come with IPv6 + NAT IPv4 and haproxy integrated in to solusvm so you can use port 80.

<img src="http://i.imgur.com/WjNuVMt.png" />

LowEndSpirit is not considered commercial grade, it is a cheap community at cost project, it comes with no SLA and no official support, all support and questions and community interaction is handled over at https://forum.lowendspirit.com


Orders from Brazil and China are currently blocked as are any orders placed from behind a VPN or Proxy.
